English: Aw, nuts! I won't forget this!
German: Dreck! Das vergesse ich nicht so schnell!

English:
Oh, man! What's a Zaxon?
Are all hackers like that?
Chinese:
真是的！？Zaxon到底是怎樣！？
是說，駭客都是那副德性嗎！？
Korean:
정말―!! 대체 뭐야, 잭슨이란 건!?
그보다, 해커는 저런 녀석들밖에 없는 거야!?
German:
Oh Mann! Was ist denn Zaxon?
Sind alle Hacker so?

English:
Coming on to you suddenly? Looking at you luridly?
Going after you all lustfully like that?
Chinese:
突然跑來搭話？　又用下流的眼神盯著人家看？
最後發情，還襲擊人家！？
Korean:
갑자기 말을 걸더니? 사람을 엉큼한 눈으로 마구 보고?
그러더니 발정해서 덮치고 말이야!?
German:
Baggern einen plötzlich an?
Setzen einem nach?

English:
They really suck!
Doesn't matter how much I'm rockin' this bod.
Chinese:
真的超差勁的！！
就算我有魔鬼身材也不能這樣啊！
Korean:
진짜, 최저 아냐!?
아무리 내가 초절 EGB(에로귀염보디)라고 해서―
German:
Was für Ekelpakete!
Auch, wenn ich gut aussehe.

English: Huh? What about just now? Huh?
Chinese: 嗯？　你說什麼？　剛才那個……嗯……
German: Hm? Was eigentlich gerade passiert ist?

English:
They weren't flirting with me? They were account
raiders?
Chinese: 咦咦？不是搭訕……而是帳號狩獵？
German:
Die haben nicht geflirtet?
Das waren Kontendiebe?

English:
Account raiders, huh?
Like the kind you hear about on the news?
Chinese:
帳……帳號狩獵……
是指登上新聞鬧很大的那個帳號狩獵？
Korean:
어, 계정 사냥이라니…
뉴스 같은 데에서 문제가 되고 있는, 그 계정 사냥!?
German:
Kontendiebe, wie?
Wie man in den Nachrichten immer hört?

English:
I guess I remember hearing that there's a lot of 
that going around in Kowloon.
Chinese: 的、的確……在Kowloon確實發生過很多次……！
German:
Ich hab glaube schon mal gehört, dass so was in
Kowloon oft passiert.

English:
So that means... that there are a lot of hackers
like the ones we just ran into?
Chinese:
也就是說……
前方也有很多剛才那樣的駭客囉！？
Korean:
그렇단 건… 이 앞에도 아까 같은 해커들이
잔뜩 있다는 거야!?
German:
Heißt das ... dass es eine ganze Horde von Hackern
wie die gibt, denen wir gerade begegnet sind?

English: In other words, my... my virtue was at risk?
Chinese: 也就是說……我我我的貞操有危險了！？
Korean: 그 말은 즉, 나… 저저저, 정조의 위기!?
German: Und die wollen alle was von mir?

English:
It's okay, I'm here to protect you!
Like I said, they weren't flirting...
Chinese:
放心吧，我會保護妳的！
所以說那不是搭訕……（以下省略）
Korean:
괜찮아, 지켜 줄게!
그러니까 헌팅이 (이하 생략
German:
Keine Sorge, ich beschütze dich!
Ich sage dir doch, die wollten nicht flirten ...

English:
Oh, my! [p]!
Y-Y-You'll keep me safe, right? Pleeease?!
Chinese:
噫噫……[p]……
我我我只能靠你了！拜託你了！好嗎？
Korean:
히, 히에에… [p]…
미미, 믿고 있으니까!? 부탁, 해!?
German:
Uiuiui! [p]!
D-Du passt auf mich auf, ja? Bitte?!
